measurements_data.comments: Includes 20,900 tonnes/year of collected HH waste and an additional 295 tonnes of uncollected waste based on a collection rate of 98.61 percent, and 9,400 tonnes/year of waste from other economic activities (commercial, institutional, medical, and cruise ships).

measurements_data.comments: CLF: Cooks Sanitary Landfill and Civic Amenities Site is referred to as a "sanitary landfill"; however, it is run as a CLF based on the performance audit report by the National Solid Waste Management Authority, 2013; CLF estimated by subtracting uncollected waste, composted, or thrown in waterways from 100 percent of the waste; CM: Calculated by the population composting compared to total population disposing garbage by various means from questionnaire on Population by Parish by Waste Disposal Method; WW: Calculated by the population dumping waste in river/sea/pond compared to total population disposing garbage by various means from questionnaire on Population by Parish by Waste Disposal Method; UA: Calculated by the population burning (0.23 percent), burying (0.04 percent), not stated (0.56 percent), and other (0:31 percent) compared to total population disposing garbage by various means  from questionnaire on Population by Parish by Waste Disposal Method

measurements_data.source: Antigua and Barbuda, Statistics Divison. 2014. "Antigua and Barbuda 2011 Population and Housing Census– Book of Statistical Tables." April.
